version_description:
Added support for Amarra sQ+
Added support for IRC Room Correction
Added support for Audio Conditioner
Various improvements and bug fixes

• Added support for Amarra 4 Music Player
• Improvements for handling artwork

- Bug Fixes for artwork, playing, and more
- Support for new Amarra Luxe 4.1 release

Amarra Remote is now Amarra Play - Version 1.4
Amarra Play is available as a free download
Access and play local iOS Device iTunes music
Download using iTunes on your computer FLAC and other music files.
When used with Amarra Luxe new features are unlocked.
Stream music from your Amarra Luxe library to your iOS device, including TIDAL
Download music from your Amarra Luxe library for offline mobile playback
MQA support to 96 kHz (First Decode)
Bug fixes and other improvements.
Support for local MQA Playback with Amarra Luxe and Support for EQ filtering for local playback.
Bug Fixing

Many improvements for iTunes file handling
Fixes for multiple tracks playing
Add support for streaming files (to showcase albums/artists)
Remote Support in Amarra Luxe (on OSX) for Qobuz music service
Bug Fixing
- Bug fixing

- We need your feedback! Bug reports, feature request your comments are welcome.
- Coming soon! Streaming from Tidal & Qobuz in Amarra Play. We streaming services as a remote for Amarra Lux, soon they will be integrated into Amarra Play
- Bug fix: crash on application launch for iPad

- Fixing application crashes
- Adding instructions on how to upload content from Amarra Lux or Finder/iTunes
- Adding Shuffle and Repeat options for local playback.
- Split content into "My Music" for library uploaded from Amarra on copied from Finder/iTunes, and iTunes content will stay in "iTunes" section

- Playlist support for local content
- Search option enabled for a local library
- Amara Lux playback initiated from remote issue fixed.
- Coming Soon: Tidal & Qobuz streaming

- Support for Qobuz streaming
- Alphabetical content grouping

- Ouch, fixing playback issues with some audio formats
- Faster library indexing and scanning
- Fixing crashes.
- Fix for app crashes on launch (work in progress).

- Support for TIDAL streaming.
- Fix for crash on launch.

- Fix for TIDAL next track playback
- Fix for Q factor not being applied on EQ

- Fix for TIDAL content search
- Fixing issues with getting TIDAL user favorites content.
- MQA ALAC decoding fixed.

- Support for Cast
- Bug fixing

Bug Fixing
- Playing content with iPad
- Searching with TIDAL improved
- Connection with Amarra Lux.

- Cast improvements
- Crash fixing
- Add sample rate indicator

- Free subscription to Artist Connection streaming platform
- Qobuz genre support
- Crashes caused by low memory condition on huge music libraries
- You can now open any music link and play from our app

- Free streaming service Artist Connection updates
- Added warnings for unplayable TIDAL content
- Get all Tidal albums for Artist
- On app startup continue from last played track
- Fixing missing Tidal content
